title: User Login with Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a user, I want to securely log in using multi-factor authentication so that my account remains protected from unauthorized access.

title: Session Management
description: As a user, I want the system to automatically log me out after periods of inactivity so that my data remains secure.

title: Password Policy Enforcement
description: As a user, I want to be guided to set a strong password meeting security standards to prevent unauthorized access.

title: Dashboard Account Overview
description: As a customer, I want to view my account balances, recent transactions, and summary at a glance so I can stay up to date on my finances.

title: Dynamic Product Recommendations
description: As a customer, I want to see products and services relevant to my profile so that I can explore personalized banking offers.

title: Quick Access Widgets
description: As a customer, I want shortcuts for commonly used actions like fund transfers or service requests to manage my banking needs efficiently.

title: Adaptive Layout
description: As a customer, I want the portal layout to adapt automatically to my device’s screen size so I can access it comfortably anywhere.

title: Consistent Branding and Navigation
description: As a user, I want consistent look-and-feel across devices so I can easily navigate and recognize the portal’s functions.

epic_title: Digital Application and Service Request Workflows
title: Account Opening Request
description: As a user, I want to submit an account opening request online so I can avoid visiting the branch.

epic_title: Digital Application and Service Request Workflows
title: Service Modification Request
description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing banking services easily via the portal to manage my needs digitally.

epic_title: Digital Application and Service Request Workflows
title: Prefilled Customer Information
description: As a user, I want the system to prefill my details in forms so that I can complete tasks quickly.

epic_title: Document Upload and Application Draft Management
title: Document Upload
description: As a user, I want to upload necessary identification and proof documents so that my application can be processed without visiting the branch.

epic_title: Document Upload and Application Draft Management
title: Save Incomplete Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save incomplete applications as drafts so that I can continue later without losing my progress.

title: Real-Time Status Updates
description: As a customer, I want to check the progress of my service requests in real time so that I can stay informed about their status.

title: Email Notifications
description: As a customer, I want to receive email notifications for critical status changes in my requests so that I am always aware of updates.

epic_title: User Activity History and Audit Trail
title: Customer Interaction History
description: As a user, I want to view a detailed history of all my past interactions and requests so that I can track my record of services.

epic_title: User Activity History and Audit Trail
title: Audit Log for Compliance
description: As a system administrator, I want to maintain immutable logs of all user actions so that we can meet auditing and compliance standards.

title: Real-Time Data Sync
description: As a user, I want my portal information to stay updated in real time so that I always see accurate data from the core banking system.

title: Seamless Transaction Updates
description: As a user, I want updates made on the portal to reflect instantly in the bank’s backend systems so operations remain consistent.

title: Independent Database Layer
description: As a system architect, I want the portal to maintain its own database structure so that performance and scalability are independent of the core banking system.

title: Backup and Recovery Mechanism
description: As a system admin, I want automated backup and recovery to ensure business continuity and minimal downtime.

title: Customer Role Permissions
description: As a customer, I want to access only those services that are appropriate for my account type and authorization level.

title: Administrator Role Management
description: As an administrator, I want to assign and manage user roles and access permissions so that only authorized personnel can perform administrative actions.
